name: Ghost Rain CP-41
details:
Echo Reverb DelayCaline's Ghost Rain CP-41 combines a warm analog delay that are splashed with a light hint of reverb for a pleasing natural sound. The reverb is subtle, just enough to give a wider field of depth feel to your delays, but not overpowering.
It  is a very good echo delay, natural dynamic, permeability clear and warn, like the echo delay in the valley, keeps the original sound the same dynamic and width. Clear timbre makes you pleased and comfortable. Echo effect is clear, natural and clean.
Very similar to analog delay. Warm, vintage delay sound
Delay Time: 25ms~600ms
Full metal shell
Very exquisite
True bypass
Revered Analog Delay
Echo, Feedback,Time Controls
Super Solid Metal Casing
Uses 9V Battery or Standard Boss Style Adapter (not included)
Brand: Caline
http://www.calinemusic.com/products/effectpedal/112.html
Weight: 1.0 lb
https://www.cheaperpedals.com/products/caline-ghost-rain-cp-41-revered-delay-pedal
